Package geometries

Interface Intersectable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cylinder, Geometries, Geometry, Plane, Polygon, Sphere, Triangle, Tube
    public interface Intersectable
    class Intersectable to define a method which receives a ray and returns its intersection points with the geometry in the geometries classes
